A young girl in her small town looks in the mirror and sees a person from another world, who is kind and encourages her to live her dream.
A man is given a mirror that shows him a world where he is healthy and content with everything in his life.
A woman in a big city sees a mirror that shows her a world where she is living in a peaceful and natural place with loved ones.
A teenage boy sees a mirror that shows him a different world with a different lifestyle. He decides to make a change and follows his new path.
In a dark and lonely world, a young boy sees a mirror that shows him a different life full of happiness and warmth.
